representation_information.name: Camera Raw Formats
representation_information.description: A group of proprietary formats employed by digital cameras that use a color filter array to capture image data. Raw files contain data captured by the sensors in the array.

extras.field: cr2, crw, dcr, kdc, mrw, nef, orf, pef, raf, srf, x3f

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
